links.description:
Define the fields list that will populate the Quick Find dialog combo box.
The fields name must match the AccountCreation service properties. For each property a optional name space may be added as a prefix like
mt:UserName
The char : is the separator. The name space is defined first.
To define a search on a mapping you must set the name space and use the any id that does NOT match an AccountCreation service property, for example :
metratech.com/external:QuickFindAlias1
QuickFindAlias1 is used as well as dictionary entry for the localization. see file mam/default/localized/en-us/textlookup/LocalizedSystemInformation.xml entry QUICKFINDALIAS1.
You can define more that one alias associated with different name space this way :
metratech.com/external:QuickFindAlias1,metratech.com/external_other:QuickFindAlias2.
